Vice Hierarch Zenya:
Relics of the Old Empire can be found by destroying Destroyer-Phantom,Assassins-Phantom,Sniper-phantom,vicious sorcerer-phantom.
Find 50 Relics of Ancient Empire and bring them to me.
Exactly! If you do this job, you can get a monster Pass to the Tomb, and if you need to get into Four Tombs, guard it carefully .
